title: I have some trouble following sentdex machinelearning tutorial.
author: t2_1084vr
text:
https://pastebin.com/8tyKMq4L  
  
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QLVMqwpOLPk&list=PLQVvvaa0QuDfKTOs3Keq_kaG2P55YRn5v&index=5  
  
So there's my code (modified it a bit but commenters on yt are having the same issue). The problem is that the forecast is just resetting already made datapoints so for example:  
  
29 january is the last data point and the forecast is supposed to be for three days, now it starts the forecast on the 27th and ends on the 29th despite already having that data. I want the forecast to start at 30 january.  
  
Anyone got a clue how to fix this?  
  
Thanks in advance!
